languages.text: {n}Караэль, друкари-переговорщик, бросает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Неужели?" {n}Его лицо разрезает недобрая ухмылка.{/n}
{n}Kharael, the Drukhari negotiator, casts a glance at you.{/n} "You don't say?" {n}An unkind smile crosses his face.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Караэль, друкари-переговорщик, бросает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Неужели?" {n}Его лицо разрезает недобрая ухмылка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael, the Drukhari envoy, gives you a quick look.{/n} "You do not say?" {n}And unkind smile crosses his face.{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

traits.speaker: Karael

traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael, der Verhandlungsführer der Drukhari, blickt dich an.{/n} "Was Ihr nicht sagt." {n}Ein unfreundliches Grinsen huscht über sein Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael, the Drukhari negotiator, casts a glance at you.{/n} "You don't say?" {n}An unkind smile crosses his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael, der Verhandlungsführer der Drukhari, blickt dich an.{/n} "Was Ihr nicht sagt." {n}Ein unfreundliches Grinsen huscht über sein Gesicht.{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}黑暗灵族的谈判官卡瑞尔看了你一眼。{/n}“噢，是吗？”{n}他脸上掠过一丝不善的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael, the Drukhari negotiator, casts a glance at you.{/n} "You don't say?" {n}An unkind smile crosses his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}黑暗灵族的谈判官卡瑞尔看了你一眼。{/n}“噢，是吗？”{n}他脸上掠过一丝不善的微笑。{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael, le négociateur drukhari, vous jette un coup d'œil.{/n} « Perspicace. » {n}Un sourire lugubre obscurcit son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael, the Drukhari negotiator, casts a glance at you.{/n} "You don't say?" {n}An unkind smile crosses his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael, le négociateur drukhari, vous jette un coup d'œil.{/n} « Perspicace. » {n}Un sourire lugubre obscurcit son visage.{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael, el negociador Drukhari, te mira.{/n} «¿No me digas?». {n}Una sonrisa desagradable cruza su cara.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael, the Drukhari negotiator, casts a glance at you.{/n} "You don't say?" {n}An unkind smile crosses his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael, el negociador Drukhari, te mira.{/n} «¿No me digas?». {n}Una sonrisa desagradable cruza su cara.{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}デュカーリの交渉人であるカラエルがあなたを一瞥する。{/n}「ああ、そうかい」{n}冷酷な笑みが彼の表情に浮かぶ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael, the Drukhari negotiator, casts a glance at you.{/n} "You don't say?" {n}An unkind smile crosses his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリの交渉人であるカラエルがあなたを一瞥する。{/n}「ああ、そうかい」{n}冷酷な笑みが彼の表情に浮かぶ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Drukhari delegesi Kharael'in gözleri sana kayıyor.{/n} "Öyle mi dersin?" {n}Yüzüne tatsız bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael, the Drukhari negotiator, casts a glance at you.{/n} "You don't say?" {n}An unkind smile crosses his face.{/n}
